CREATE TABLE results
(
    resultId        INTEGER
        primary key autoincrement,
    raceId          INTEGER default 0  not null,
    driverId        INTEGER default 0  not null,
    constructorId   INTEGER default 0  not null,
    number          INTEGER,
    grid            INTEGER default 0  not null,
    position        INTEGER,
    positionText    TEXT    default '' not null,
    positionOrder   INTEGER default 0  not null,
    points          REAL   default 0  not null,
    laps            INTEGER default 0  not null,
    time            TEXT,
    milliseconds    INTEGER,
    fastestLap      INTEGER,
    rank            INTEGER default 0,
    fastestLapTime  TEXT,
    fastestLapSpeed TEXT,
    statusId        INTEGER default 0  not null,
    foreign key (raceId) references races(raceId),
    foreign key (driverId) references drivers(driverId),
    foreign key (constructorId) references constructors(constructorId),
    foreign key (statusId) references status(statusId)
);

content.content:
CREATE TABLE drivers
(
    driverId    INTEGER
        primary key autoincrement,
    driverRef   TEXT default '' not null,
    number      INTEGER,
    code        TEXT,
    forename    TEXT default '' not null,
    surname     TEXT default '' not null,
    dob         DATE,
    nationality TEXT,
    url         TEXT default '' not null
        unique
);

content.text: Good, I can see `fastestLapSpeed` in `results` and `nationality` in `drivers`. Now let me find who achieved the maximum fastest lap speed and check their nationality.

input.command: sqlite3 "/Users/david/workspace/claimdb/test_dbs/formula_1.sqlite" "SELECT r.fastestLapSpeed, d.forename, d.surname, d.nationality FROM results r JOIN drivers d ON r.driverId = d.driverId WHERE r.fastestLapSpeed != '' AND r.fastestLapSpeed IS NOT NULL ORDER BY CAST(r.fastestLapSpeed AS REAL) DESC LIMIT 5;"
input.description: Find the driver with the max fastest lap speed

content.text:
The result is clear. The maximum `fastestLapSpeed` is **257.320**, achieved by **Rubens Barrichello**, whose nationality is **Brazilian**, not Dutch.
